attributes.action: Do more to try and help working people afford childcare
attributes.additional_details: As a mum of two kids under the age of two i feel like it is made to easy to think why should i work? Especially working for a council who then dont help you be able to work by giving you council nursery spaces. It is becoming extremely hard and stressful for mums everywhere to try and earn a living for there family without either paying it all back to childcare or working around the tiny amount or no hours the council nurseries offers you.
attributes.background: As a mum of two under two i now know how tough it is in this day and age to try and juggle childcare between working full time with the prices of private nurseries and the lack of spaces in council nurseries! This needs attention and a solution to ease the stress of working parents.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 
	
We understand that you are concerned about the cost of childcare for working parents, but we're not exactly sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign these petitions which we've published:

Fund free childcare for all from 3 months to school age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604838

Remove the cap on tax-free childcare so it meets more families’ needs:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602389
